body.description: It luggage's best-selling world's lightest range continues to evolve and reinvent itself. This iconic collection keeps its strong design DNA, while adding enhanced features such as an 8 wheel rolling system, elegant colors, optimized volumes, and extra protection. The IT Luggage world's lightest is constructed from high density polyester fabric and features a durable fiberglass frame with a sturdy locking handle system made from a single piece of aluminum. Available in a range of colors to suit your personal sense of style, this all-inclusive spinner rolling carry-on offers style and storage while its featherweight design lets you travel with ease.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Purple Pennant shown it captures every journey Designed in London it luggage World's Lightest 8 Wheel Spinner Collection Our globally sold World's Lightest Collection continues to live up to its name! Don't worry about those airline weight restrictions with this collection! Its combination of an exceptionally lightweight frame, abrasion resistant fabric and features make for a very functional, simple, and high quality luggage that's a perfect mate wherever your next journey lands you. TOUGH FIBERGLASS FRAME - Exceptionally lightweight frame is deceptively strong and built to last HIGH-TENSILE FABRIC - Durable, lightweight material resists abrasion and prolongs use FLAT PACKING INTERIOR - "No Pipes" means more space and keeps clothing crease-free SUPERIOR WHEEL CONTROL - Constant design and testing ensures the performance of our wheels lead the industry 31.5" Checked Bag - Exterior Dimensions (including wheels): 31.5 x 18.3 x 10.2 inches - Interior Dimensions: 28 x 17.9 x 10.2 inches - Weight: 5.29 lbs.s 27.6" Checked Bag: Exterior Dimensions (including wheels): 27.6 x 16.1 x 10.2 inches - Interior Dimensions: 24 x 15.9 x 9 inches - Weight: 4.51 lbs. 22" Carry-On Bag: Exterior Dimensions: 22 x 14 x 9 inches, interior Dimensions: 18.7 x 13 x 9 inches, weight: 4.07 lbs
Key Features Wide Handle Design S360 - Blue Ashes shown Wheels S561 - Magnet shown Exterior Front Pockets S392 - Raven shown Fully Lined Interior S492 - Evening Blue shown

About it lugage it luggage has become recognized throughout the world for offering exceptional value, modern design and excellent quality. Established in 1985, for over 30 years we've focused on designing luggage products that meet the travel needs of global consumers with features that make traveling easier, more secure and bags more fun. Designed in London, from our lightweight, versatile, high capacity softside cases to our aspirational, hardside cases, we build solutions for every taste and every need. it captures every journey...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again!
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot and I love this piece. It’s a good size for a full week of travel (fits all my clothes, shoes, toiletries, etc.). I love how light, yet durable it is. This is my 3rd purchase from the IT luggage collection. I think it’s really great quality for the price point!!My only 2 issues are that sometimes it leans toward 1 side when I’m rolling. I don’t know if I unevenly packed or if the wheels are unevenly attached...it doesn’t bother me too much, but it’s enough to notice.The 2nd thing is that the handle bar is very wide. It makes it nice to lean on when you’re waiting in the airport, but it’s too wide to slip my backpack over (which has a built-in strap to secure itself over the narrower hand pulls on most luggage). Also not a big deal, but sometimes a minor inconvenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wedding Dress Coffufle
reviews.reviewText: With most airlines now using closet space as storage, I was not gaurenteed to hang my wedding dress in one, from USA to Paris, Paris to Denmark where my fiance and I were getting married. Not to mention if I did use a closet, it would count as a carry on, and I wouldn't have been able to take my needed laptop and other essentials. I needed something incredibly light weight, and that just reached the limits for what international carry one are allowed. My wedding dress is good incredibly fluffy, as it is complete European lace, but surprisingly only 5 pounds. I was able to roll/fold it, and successfully fit it into the carry on, as well as rest my large 17" gaming laptop on top. It had front top pocket big enough to put 6 months of boxes of medication in, and a longer front pocket for my documents and jewelry. When I was about to get onto a flight from Paris to Copenhagen, the flight attendant taking our boarding passes did take an extra look at my bag, most likely though because it was bulging, but I was allowed on with it no problem. Others had bigger bags than I, yet they would fit them in the overhead bins. My carry on did fall forward a few times, as it's sooooo light weight. But that is to be expected and shouldn't be taken as a negative. Thank you for making my wedding a breeze!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saves me hours of waiting at the luggage carousel!
reviews.reviewText: This is my 4th IT lightweight luggage purchase. I purchased 2 last year for me and my son and 2 more this year for 2 other family members. No more check ins for my large suitcases..I havent used large luggage for the past 2 years and have used it for 3 separate vacations to Florida! Each family member takes one as their carryon and now getting in and out of airports has never been easier! Making travels less stressful not having to wait for my luggage on the carousel has saved me hours of time during travel! Luggage is not showing any wear from travelling through airports. Lightweight and easy to maneuver. There is an expandable zippered compartment that can hold so much more and always comes in use when travelling back home with more stuff than what I came with. If you pack heavier items towards bottom wheel area when packing it with you can avoid the tipping over that can happen.When people complain about luggage tipping it has nothing to do with how well the luggage is made but is a cause and effect of how the user packed it. Tipping over can be avoided with proper weight distribution of your clothing and items. I tell all my friends and family to put away the large suitcases and try travelling light with this luggage. You will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Not sure how long this will last -- it's not sturdy enough to be a legacy piece, but it's lightweight and great for kids to handle in airports. Plus, the handle, rather than a smallish telescoping size, is actually wide and thus easier to grab, especially if young kids want to lean and push. I'm happy with the buy, but expect I'll buy another one when this one wears out sooner than others which are more sturdily made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best suitcase! Easily meets carry on criteria for all airlines!
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these carry on suitcases for a 3 week trip through Spain and Portugal. One for my mother in law and one for myself. Theses bags were put to the test! At first I was concerned about the strength of the wheels. I watched many times as my mother in law drug her bag down stairs with no damage. We rolled these bags for blocks on all kinds of surfaces (cobblestone) to make our way to hotels. They held up beautifully in all respects. They are well designed and plenty roomy...it was my only suitcase for a 3 week trip. We flew Alaska Air, American and Norwegian Air...this bag easily passed all criteria for carry on. I would highly recommend this bag for a European trip because of its light weight, it’s easily carried up and down stairs...or dragged 😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best and lightest suitcase ever!
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot. This is the best and lightest suitcase I have ever used. I bought one for my friend and we traveled to Europe with them for a month. We kept praising them everywhere we went. They rolled beautifully and are so light and sturdy. We got the size that works as a carry on on most airlines and they were perfect. We got the broad handled ones and they worked great. Lifting them up to the overhead was easy. We packed for the month and kept the weight to 10 kilos. When the suitcase is so light you can pack more clothes!
Have used on a couple of trips and still in great shape. It is 21.5 inches high. Rolls well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Lovely and lightweight ,I am 81 and they are so light weight I can still book my holidays with out asking for help

The best thing about this lugguage is that it feels weightless! It is 5lbs lighter than other bags its size, & it's wheels roll like a dream. Super smooth & very easy to steer. Plus it allows you to bring more.....without the worry of being over the weight limit. I just returnedfrom a 3 week vacation.....incredibly happy with this "IT" lugguage.
Las medidas que estan en la descripción son las exactas, tiene buen espacio al tener la varilla en los extremos, el material es de buena calidad
Excellent sac de cabine, super léger et maniable, solide, ma fille l'adore, ça remplace un vieux Samsonite bien plus cher avec brio !
